Responsibilities include reconciling accounts, recording transactions, and ensuring all financial data is accurate and up to date. If you have a solid background in bookkeeping and are proficient with accounting software, I would love to hear from you. Please provide your experience and relevant qualifications when applying.
title: Bookkeeping Update for Current Year

description: Hello, an aerospace company located in Glastonbury CT is looking for a PowerBI Expert to help build out some informative dashboards that will be used to be displayed out in our shop floor. Currently we have a small project of properly filtering down an existing report that was made, but we eventually will like to expand into reports that automatically display our yearly and monthly shipping goals, on-time delivery, bookings all in near real-time from the system. We run Epicor for our enterprise resource planning solution. Having Some Epicor knowledge or experience is a very desirable plus! The back end for this data is Microsoft SQL (on-prem hosted).
title: PowerBI Expert Needed for Epicor ERP Analysis

description: POSITION OVERVIEW: We seek a self-driven, highly motivated engineer with a strong background in Mold design and other plastic forming technologies. This candidate will manage the Mold development, procurement and validation and ensure that we are taking advantage of the best and most innovative technologies available to design, produce and maintain Molds. CORE RESPONSIBILITIES: Developing and implementing tooling strategies to support production goals. Manage new tool construction projects. Collaborating with engineering and production teams to ensure efficient tooling design and implementation. Manage the tooling repair department. Designing and developing tooling for large-scale machinery, ensuring compatibility with high-tonnage presses and other advanced equipment. Collaborating with engineering and production teams to optimize tooling for large-scale, complex machinery operations. Monitoring tooling performance and identifying areas for improvement. Designing and developing new tooling, fixtures, and gages to support production activities. Creating and maintaining documentation for all tooling and processes. Analysing data to identify areas for improvement and making recommendations. Collaborating with suppliers to ensure quality and reliability of tooling. Research technologies for enhanced Mold repair, maintenance and construction of new and existing Molds and ensure improved performance. Collaborate with engineering to assure new and existing product and tool designs are moldable and suggest design changes or alternative processes. Proactively seek opportunities for Continuous Improvement by researching new technologies for improvements to product, Molds, materials, and manufacturing. Collaborate with vendors to bring alternative methods, materials, and equipment to manufacturing to improve Molds and Mold maintenance. Assist manufacturing in process improvement. QUALIFICATIONS: A bachelor’s degree in engineering or a related field. 15+ years’ experience in the Injection molding industry with focus on tool design. 10+ years in supervisory and management capacity. Strong project management skills. Direct hands-on experience in Mold design and construction is a must. Experience working with large-scale machinery, including presses with significant tonnage (e.g., among the largest in the industry) Proven ability to design and manage tooling projects for complex, high-capacity manufacturing equipment. Proficient with 3D modelling software. Ability to read and interpret Moldflow analyses. Background in working with various Mold material and metal types. Advanced experience in both cold runner and hot runner manifold systems. Strong analytical, creativity, and problem-solving skills. Experience collaborating with teams of engineers and technicians. Excellent written/verbal communication skills, and superior interpersonal skills for interaction with all levels of personnel and contacts within and outside company. Proficient in presentations, technical reports, and situational analysis. Good working knowledge of plastics manufacturing processes including injection molding, extrusion, blow Mold, thermoform and others. Background in working with various polymers. Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Travel is a critical part of this role and can be every week depending on situation. MUST HAVE A bachelor’s degree in engineering or a related field. 15+ years’ experience in the Injection molding industry with focus on tool design. 10+ years in supervisory and management capacity. Experience with large-scale machinery and tooling for high-capacity production environments. Strong project management skills. Direct hands-on experience in Mold design and construction is a must. Experience with 3D modelling software. (SolidWorks) Ability to read and interpret Moldflow analyses. Experience in working with various Mold material and metal types. Advanced experience in both cold runner and hot runner manifold systems. Experience collaborating with teams of engineers and technicians. Experience of plastics manufacturing processes including injection molding, extrusion, blow Mold, thermoform and others. Experience in working with various polymers. Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Travel is a critical part of this role and can be every week depending on situation.
title: Tooling Engineer

description: We’re looking for someone who can write an engaging script about how one of our clients improved their business by using our software. These videos are typically just 1-min long and have some light story-telling and light SEO/Marketing language. I’ll provide materials, reference guides, and examples when we move forward.
title: Script for Digital Marketing Testimonial

description: I’m the founder of a fast-growing business, and I need a detail-oriented financial analyst/bookkeeper to help me audit and organize my finances. The goal is to create a clear financial picture by reviewing data from January 1, 2024, to present. You’ll work one-on-one with me to identify trends, reconcile accounts, and develop actionable insights. Responsibilities: • Audit financial data from our custom CRM, AMEX statements, and processed checks. • Reconcile all revenue and expenses for the year to date, ensuring all accounts balance. • Identify and report discrepancies or inefficiencies in spending. • Create detailed financial reports, including cash flow analysis, profit margins, and expense breakdowns. • Collaborate with me to suggest areas for cost savings or increased profitability. Requirements: • Proven experience in accounting, financial analysis, or forensic bookkeeping. • Proficiency in reconciling credit card statements, checks, and CRM data. • Strong Excel/Google Sheets skills for creating custom financial reports. • Excellent communication skills to explain findings clearly and concisely. • Attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy. • Familiarity with CRM systems and financial software (experience with TypeScript-based CRM is a plus). Preferred Qualifications: • Experience working with startups or rapidly scaling businesses. • Knowledge of AMEX business accounts and processing workflows. • Prior experience conducting financial audits or consulting on cash flow management. Deliverables: • A full audit of my business finances from January 1 to present. • Clear and actionable reports showing revenue, expenses, and overall profitability. • Recommendations for optimizing financial operations moving forward. Timeline: I would like to start as soon as possible, with the audit completed within 2-4 weeks. Confidentiality: You’ll be handling sensitive financial information, so confidentiality and trust are absolutely essential. Please provide references or examples of similar work upon request. Budget: Open to hourly or fixed pricing—please provide your rate and estimated hours for completing this project.
title: Financial Analyst/Bookkeeper Needed for Business Audit and Financial Reporting

description: Phase 1: Migrate off QB Desktop by EOY o Hire a QB Conversion Expert to assist with the transition. o Clean up QB as much as possible before migration o New/updated Chart of Accounts o Ensure all AR, AP, and Balance Sheet elements transition over. Run Pre and Post P&L, Cash Receipts, and Balance Sheet to ensure they match. o All data to be copied over. o Input all new banking and credit card processing information (as it does not transfer) o Assistance in setting up users. o Maybe a ½ day training session? o Interim solution for invoice and deposit data (i.e. aggregated billed and received by month)
title: Migrate QuickBooks Desktop to QuickBooks Online

description: We are seeking a skilled designer to assist with the design for manufacturing of a specialty tool that incorporates both mechanical hardware and software components. The ideal candidate will have experience in developing functional and manufacturable designs, as well as knowledge of integrating hardware and software systems. You will collaborate with our team to ensure that the design meets all specifications and can be efficiently produced. Strong communication and problem-solving skills are essential for this role.
title: Design for Manufacturing Specialist for Specialty Tool

description: We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Investment Research Analyst to help us develop a comprehensive market map of the M&A software landscape, with a particular focus on AI-driven tools. This role will also involve identifying potential acquisition targets in related segments, such as finance and legal technology, to support DealRoom's strategic growth initiatives. Key Responsibilities: - Conduct in-depth market research to map out the M&A software landscape, including tools across the entire lifecycle of M&A. - Analyze trends in AI-driven tools and their applications within the M&A space, identifying key players and emerging technologies. - Create a detailed and visually compelling market map, highlighting competitors, adjacencies, and opportunities. - Research and identify acquisition targets within M&A software or adjacent industries, including finance and legal technology. - Evaluate potential acquisition candidates based on strategic fit, technology, and market positioning. - Present findings in clear, actionable formats for internal stakeholders. Qualifications: -Strong background in market research, analysis, or a related field, preferably in technology or software. -Knowledge of the M&A process and familiarity with tools and software used across its lifecycle. -Proven experience using research databases like PitchBook, Capital IQ, or similar platforms, with the ability to extract and analyze relevant data efficiently. -Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to synthesize data into actionable insights. -Familiarity with AI-driven tools or experience researching AI-related technologies is a plus. -Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex findings in an accessible manner. -Self-starter with the ability to work independently in a remote environment. What We Offer: -Flexible, remote working arrangements. -An opportunity to directly shape DealRoom’s growth strategy and market position. -A chance to collaborate with a leading fintech company that’s transforming the M&A industry. -Interested candidates should submit a resume, a brief cover letter, and examples of previous research or analytical projects.
title: Looking for an Investment Research Analyst for Market Mapping and M&A Software Analysis

description: Description: We are an innovative education tech startup seeking a skilled professional to help us refine and execute our outbound email strategy. Your role will focus on leveraging tools like Google Alerts & RB2B to identify potential leads, crafting targeted outbound email sequences, and optimizing our CRM for lead gen and automation software to increase conversions and drive app downloads. Key Responsibilities: - Set up and manage outbound email sequences using platforms like Clay, Rb2b, and HubSpot. - Utilize signals from Google Alerts or similar tools to identify and engage prospective leads. - Write compelling, personalized emails to book meetings and convert prospects. - Assist in software setup and workflow optimization for email campaigns and lead management. - Monitor and improve campaign performance over time. What We're Looking For: - Proven experience with Clay, Rb2b, HubSpot, Insightly, or similar tools. - Expertise in crafting and managing email campaigns designed for lead conversion. - A strategic thinker who understands the nuances of outbound marketing and B2B engagement. - Ability to analyze results and adjust tactics for better outcomes. This will start as a trial project to assess fit and effectiveness, with potential for a long-term collaboration as we refine and scale the process. If you’re passionate about helping startups grow and have the skills to make it happen, we’d love to work with you!
title: Top of Funnel GTM Expert Needed - RB2B, Clay, Hubspot

description: About Us: Willow is an innovative SaaS edtech platform dedicated to transforming high school into a purpose-driven journey for students. We help students discover their passions, explore career paths, and uncover educational opportunities through dynamic, AI-driven tools. As a startup, we move fast, embrace creativity, and rely on a small, collaborative team where everyone wears many hats. The Role: We’re seeking a talented and motivated UI/UX Designer to join our team on a part-time basis (~15 hours per week). In this role, you will turn ideas into prototypes, create and run usability tests, and transform validated prototypes into high-fidelity designs. You’ll also contribute to the user research process, ensuring our designs are grounded in the needs and experiences of our student and educator users. As part of a fast-moving startup, your work will have a direct impact on our product, and you’ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of Willow. Responsibilities: - Collaborate with the team to turn concepts into interactive prototypes. - Design and execute usability tests to gather actionable feedback. - Evolve prototypes into pixel-perfect, high-fidelity designs ready for development. - Conduct user research and testing sessions to inform design decisions. - Work closely with developers to ensure seamless implementation of designs. - Maintain and contribute to our design system to ensure consistency across the platform. - Embrace a hands-on approach, taking on a variety of tasks to support our small but mighty team. Qualifications: - Proven experience in UI/UX design with a strong portfolio showcasing prototypes and high-fidelity designs. - Proficiency in Figma. - Experience with usability testing and user research methodologies. - Strong understanding of responsive and mobile-first design principles. - Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. - Excellent communication skills to convey ideas and insights effectively. - Experience in the education sector or edtech is a plus. What We Offer: - Flexible hours to fit your schedule. - A collaborative, startup environment where your ideas and creativity are valued. - The chance to make a meaningful impact on students' lives and futures.
title: Experienced UI/UX Designer Needed for Innovative Project

description: PTS uses Business Objects as its reporting tool. All PTS data including the data imported from IFS is reportable through Business Objects. 18 universes supporting a variety of different views of the PTS data enable users to create, save, and schedule their own reports.
title: SAP BO Developer

description: We are seeking a highly experienced, remote, and self-motivated C++ Developer with 10 to 15 years of hands-on expertise in software development. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of delivering complex real-time distributed applications and systems and must be able to commit at least 10 hours per week. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software solutions. Strong problem-solving skills, coupled with an in-depth understanding of C++ standards and best practices, are essential to succeed in this position. If you are a passionate C++ expert eager to tackle challenging projects, we would love to hear from you!
title: Senior C++ Developer (20 Years Experience Required)
